description: Retrieves the resource policies attached to the specified contact or escalation plan.

parameters.name: ContactArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact or escalation plan.

nested_items.name: ContactArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the contact or escalation plan.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: Details about the resource policy attached to the contact or escalation plan.
